column3: Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine the holy blade Save the Queen would one day find its way into my hands. We are fortunate to have recovered it before the enemy's main host arrived.

Forgive me, we have not been formally introduced. My name is Rostik. For the longest time I chose to fight alone against the Empire, but I see now the foolishness of my endeavor. And, considering the great debt I owe to Bajsaljen, it seemed only natural that I lend my blade to the Resistance.
We first met at Providence Point, did we not? It is heartening to know a fellow gunbreaker, and companion to Radovan, is here among us.
Now faced with the imperials' warships, the odds are against us. But we mustn't lose hope, my friend. If anyone can lead us to victory, it is Bajsaljen.

Curious that the IVth Legion would amass such a fleet and yet choose to retreat rather than attack. By all accounts they do not intend to fall back to Dalmasca, so what is it they are after, I wonder?
I will leave the unraveling of the imperials' plans to better minds like Bajsaljen. My skill set is of far better use on the battlefield.

Though I'm loath to admit it, Bajsaljen was right─there is only so much one man can accomplish on his own. But together, there is no limit to our potential. Bozja <Emphasis>will</Emphasis> be free, of that I have no doubt.

So they came here in search of Allagan relics, did they? If they should uncover anything resembling the Ultima Weapon, they must be dealt with before such a monstrosity can be unleashed upon the world.
